section.title: Deploying Couchbase Using Azure CLI
section.p: You can use the Azure Resource Management(ARM) templates to install Couchbase Enterprise using Azure CLI or the Azure Portal. The template provisions a virtual network, VM Scale Sets (VMSS), Managed Disks with Premium Storage and public IPs with a DNS record per node. It also sets up a network security group.
To get the templates and details on how to use the templates, see .

p.note: These templates are provided as references and are not officially supported by Couchbase.
